body:
>
> rcalc.c calls exit(0) when finished, which is supposed to flush all the
> output streams.
>


Harbison and Steele's *C: A Reference Manual* agrees, and so does the MS
documentation.


WtF?


I suppose it is possible this is some subtle pointer bug. :-(
​
Randolph
